name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Cecil HOLMES, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, Hutchinson and zappala, jj.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Cecil HOLMES, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div. Asst. Dist. Atty., Marianne Cox, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
462 A.2d 206
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Cecil HOLMES, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania;
Submitted April 22, 1983.
Decided July 5, 1983.
Louis Lipschitz, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div. Asst. Dist. Atty., Marianne Cox, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, Hutchinson and zappala, jj.
